name: Ghost Importer
author: Tyson Armstrong

sections.description: Generate an export file from your Ghost blog admin and use this plugin to import posts, their tags and a few translatable settings to your WordPress installation. Images will also be copied across if you provide the URL for your Ghost blog.
sections.installation: Upload the Ghost Importer plugin to your blog and activate it.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Upload the Ghost Importer plugin to your blog and activate it.

short_description: Import posts, images, tags and settings from a Ghost export file into Wordpress.
description: Generate an export file from your Ghost blog admin and use this plugin to import posts, their tags and a few translatable settings to your WordPress installation. Images will also be copied across if you provide the URL for your Ghost blog.
